title: Good experience and saved money
text: The most expensive part of selling a house are the realtor commissions.  I was skeptical about Clever offering a low pre-negotiated commsion for the seller's realtor fee but they stayed true to their policy and didn't charge any more after closing.  The realtor Clever provided me was a seasoned realtor who knew the current tough market (higher interest, limited buyers) and was able to secure a buyer with a contract in 32 days.  He presented my home with detailed descriptions, professional stagging and photographs to set my house apart from the rest of    the 3 competive homes on the market at that time.  I had a smooth and wonderful experience using Clever and will recommend it to anyone looking to save money and not sacrifice on a qualified realtor.

title: The Antonakos Group - Exceptional in Every Way!
text: Erica and Alex Antonakos,Thank you very much for the professionalism, expertise, and commitment you both exude as Real Estate Experts. Having worked with Clever before, I had exceptional confidence that I chose the right people to work with and Alex and Erica proved my decision 100% correct.Location, location, and location are well-known as the three most important elements when purchasing real estate. People seldom talk about the three most important aspects of selling real estate. In my view, they are Knowledge, Understanding, and Will. Alex and Erica always displayed those qualities throughout the experience of selling my property.Knowledge: The neighborhood, the marketplace, pricing strategy, negotiation tactics, and how to appeal to buyers.Understanding: My situation and desire for a quick no-nonsense sale, the buyer’s agent, taking the time to view the other homes on the block to determine our pricing strategy, and the ability to communicate for an absentee owner.Will: The will to push the sale forward and close as soon as possible. The willingness to be at the house whenever necessary and help the buyers. The diligence to communicate with me through email, text, and calls as soon as possible.The home was under contract within a week of listing. I am grateful for everything Alex and Erica did to ensure they met my goal for the home to close quickly. Clever is great to work with and well represented by the Antonakos Group!

title: Karina was pleasant and helpful from…
text: Karina was pleasant and helpful from the very beginning of my search.   She listened to me and was attentive to my specific requests and concerns.   She returned all phone calls and texts in a timely manner.  She always made sure to allot ample time for virtual tours and showings. She was adaptable to my limited schedule for showings due to distance and family obligations.  The entire process from beginning to closing went very smoothly.   No glitches.  I moved 2 years ago and that experience was a struggle from beginning to end.  I highly recommend Karina, especially if you are a first home buyer as you can depend on her to answer all your questions and guide you through the entire process.

title: Smart Choice Great Experience
text: I had done everything myself expecting to list FSBO but then discovered Clever that sounded too good to be true.  I got brave and entered my request and shortly there were 3 leads offered to me.  I didn't even have to call because Agents were contacting me directly.  I was able to meet with the first one within an hour.  This Agent was professional, did not waste my time or his, and he explained all he had to offer, his thoughts and plans to get the house sold and actually scared me at first he was so confident. I let the other Agents know I found my 'guy' and they were fine and didn't contact me again. I was thrilled to be able to save 1% or more listing commission as I wanted to keep costs down.  He was worth full price, didn't cut any corners and was 100% available with immediate responses.  He looked out for my interest before his own.  He listened to my ideas and always included me in decisions with logical points.  Some improvements I didn't go with, but never a complaint, always positive.  Sold and closed in less than 30 days.

title: Use this service!  I was looking for a realtor to sell our…
text: I was looking for a realtor to sell our home. They all were charging 6% or more. I Googled low percentage realtors and Clever was one of the options that came up. I filled out the online form and immediately I received a call. We discussed my location and the property. They sent me names of three local realtors that charged 3.5%. We very shortly spoke with one who we contracted with and he was great! Sold our home quickly. We had some issues with inspections and he was right on top of it keeping communication open between us and the buyers realtor. Working through Clever saved us a lot of money!

title: Never heard of them before, love them now
text: I never heard of Clever before our recent home sale a did the research and read the reviews. The process was simple, answer some questions and the provide you with realtors to pick from an interview them, select and move forward. Clever did check in a few times but outside the set pricing structure it’s just you and the realtor. You can always go to Clevwr for 2nd opinions. We were very happy with our realtor and sold our house at list price (which other realtors wanted to go in much lower) in a tough rate market. Absolutely no reason to not use Clever unless your specific realtor isn’t part of their network.  It helped us save alot of money, they were a secondary sounding board, and they were a good way to identify realtors to interview.

From the professional photography to listing details to coordinating showings to negotiating contract and closing details, we were always informed in advance so we could choose the best options to meet our needs. title: A Game Changer in Real Estate
text: After a failed attempt at the "for sale by owner" route, my cousin recommended Clever, and it turned out to be the best decision we made in our real estate journey. Upon submitting our inquiry, we received a prompt call and were connected with multiple realtors in our area.The realtor we chose through Clever was nothing short of amazing. Their expertise and dedication were evident from the start, guiding us through every step of the process with ease. Thanks to their assistance, we were able to close on the property without encountering any issues.One of the most remarkable aspects of using Clever was the financial benefit it brought us. Not only did we successfully sell our property, but we also ended up with an extra $5,000 in our pocket, a pleasant surprise that we attribute to Clever's efficient and cost-effective approach.I wholeheartedly recommend Clever to anyone navigating the real estate market. Whether buying or selling, Clever's platform simplifies the process, connects you with top-notch professionals, and ultimately helps you maximize your financial gains. Don't hesitate to give Clever a try; you won't be disappointed.
